resources.string: Please add more information about your plant ...
All required fields of the plant are filled.
The plant categories could not be loaded. This means that all edited plants do not have a category.
Would you like to close the app to prevent damage to your recoded plants?
Error: Add the plant category in the strings.xml file.
User does not exist or password is wrong.
Please fill in a valid email address.
The sign up process was successful. You should receive an e-mail soon.
Remove the plant from the platform
Would you like to open the map and place the plant first?
The recorded position of the plant might be too far off. Please check it.
The GPS position is probably too far away from reality. Please check on the map if it is ok.
If you delete the plant online, the plant, all comments and all other information about this plant is lost.
Would you like to remove the plant from the online platform?
Would you like to upload the plant like this?
On \"%1$s\", the category \"%2$s\" can only be uploaded as \"%3$s\".
There is another plant of a similar type close to this plant. If you upload the plant, this might be a duplicate.
Would you like to check the map and cancel the upload?
Are you sure you want to delete?
If you delete the plant, all images and data of the plant on your phone will be lost. If you uploaded the plant, the platform still has the data.
The server responded with an unexpected return code.
An error has occurred and if the developers put in more time, you would know more about what is going on. Time to start developing the app!
This operation is not yet implemented.
The plant was uploaded to the online platform.
The plant has successfully been updated.
The plant was deleted from the online platform.
The plant could not be published online because the server rejected the data.
The server did not respond with a plant id. Have a look on-line at what happened.
Could not resolve the host name and thus could not connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection.
Could not get the address from OpenStreetMap.
Could not ask the server if the plant exists.
There was an error with the connection to the server.
The plant could not be deleted online. There was some error. Please go online and delete it yourself.

The identity of the server is not trusted. This is a known problem on older platforms. Currently, you can disable trusted connections in the settings to work around this error. Feel free to contribute a solution.
The markers returned by the platform are in an unexpected format. Maybe they changed the API? Please report this issue, see the About page in the menu.
Could not sign up at Mundraub.org.
There was an error with the used protocol.
The algorithm for the encryption is not present.
Could not initilalize the key management.
The connection to the server timed out.
Could not sign up to Na-Ovoce.cz. The server did not return a user id.
Could not log in to Na-Ovoce.cz. The server did not return an authorization token. Please check your username and password and try again.
The category of this plant is not available on this platform. I can not publish this plant. Please choose another category or upload it somewhere else.
The plant has no valid position. It cannot be published.
Please choose a plant category to upload the plant.
There was an error when I tried to establish a secure connection to the server.
The plant has no recorded position. The marker is where the last plant was placed. Please find the correct position.
This is the unofficial app for Mundraub.org. The source is open. You are invited to contribute.
View the source code of version %1$s at commit %2$s.
You have the freedom to run, study, redistribute and improve the software.
If you experience any problem with the app and like to report it, you can open a new issue.
This app has a dual licensing model: GPL version 3 for the app and additionally the MIT license for the map.
The app encountered an unexpected error and crashed. If you like to help fix the problem, please go to F-Droid, open the Issue Tracker and report the crash with the file %s.
Would you like to use the error report?
Would you like to give the permission now, so the app can use this functionality?
I could not open the permission dialog because the API version of this device is too low. Try granting the permission yourself!
The app needs permission to access the location of the device in order to fill in the position of the plant automatically.
The app needs permission to access the camera in order to take pictures of plants.
The app needs permission to write the found plants to the device storage so they can be seen when the app is closed and opened again.
The app needs permission to access the Internet in order to allow you to upload plants to the Internet.
The permission is not given, so the app cannot do that.
When there is a plant in range, the phone can vibrate for a short while to notify you. Even if you give permission, you can switch vibration on and off in the settings.
If this is enabled, this app publishes the plants to Mundraub.org.
If this is enabled, this app publishes the plants to Na-Ovoce.cz.
If this is enabled, this app publishes the plants to FruitMap.org.
If this is enabled, this app does not publish the plants but instead simulates a local API for testing.

If this is enabled, this app connections to Mundraub.org and other servers are trusted by the Certificate Authorities. This may cause a problem on older platforms which can not verify the certificate.

If this is enabled, the app uses the cache directory for the plants. You can delete them when you need to. If this is disabled, the app uses the external storage, so you can sync and transfer the plants.
The settings are allowed to change. This is not displayed.
The plants could not be moved to the desired directory.
Can the app take pictures of plants?
Can the app store plants on the external storage?
Can the app fill in the plant position from GPS?
Can the app connect to Mundraub and Map services?
Can the app vibrate if the fruit radar detects a fruit?
App permissions can only be edited externally. Please open the Android settings of the app to change them.
This version of Android is too old to revoke permissions of the app. Sorry.
When the app starts after it crashed: If this is enabled, you will be asked if you want to use the error report.
If this is enabled, the map is filled with the downloaded plant markers. If disabled, an up-to-date version is used from Mundraub.org.
In order to have something off-line, we need to download the data. You can also use what is already on the phone.
Would you like to update the offline data now?
All selected plants markers are downloaded.
The debug API can not download offline data. Please use the Mundraub API at the bottom of the settings.
If this is enabled, the app provides the Mundraub map API to the local network. No harm can be done as this API is read only.
When this is checked, you can choose your plant category from Mundraub.org.
When this is checked, you can choose your plant category from Na-Ovoce.cz.
When this is checked, you can choose your plant category from FruitMap.org.
When this is checked, you can choose categories of plants which are only available in the app and contributed by the community.
If this is enabled, the app notifies you about edible plants nearby.
When the plant is %1$d meters away, you receive a notification.
test radar notifications on the map
The fruit radar only works in offline mode because it needs the markers downloaded.
Would you like to enter the offline mode now?
If this is enabled and a plant appears on the fruit radar, this phone vibrates.
If this is enabled, the app downloads all plant markers from Mundraub.org.
If this is enabled, the app downloads all plant markers from Na-Ovoce.cz.
If this is enabled, the app downloads all plant markers from FruitMap.org.
Choose which areas of the map to take offline.
Taking the map offline reduces Internet communication and allows you to view the map when you do not have an Internet connection which helps finding plants.
This app works best in offline mode when all plants from different platforms are downloaded. In online-mode, you can only use Mundraub.org because they allow getting plants in a certain range.
You want to have %1$d areas offline. About %2$s should be the size of all map tile images on your phone. Currently, %3$s are in use.
You deleted all offline areas but the downloaded parts are still using up space.
Would you like to delete all offline tiles?
I would like to be able to zoom out in offline mode. This also downloads the map tiles to zoom out and requires about one third of additional space.
All selected parts of the map have been downloaded and are now available offline.
Please make sure before you create an entry or before you harvest, that no property rights conflict.
Be careful with trees, nature and animals living there. Picking for your own needs is allowed but not more and not commercially. You need a permit for that.
Share the fruit of your discovery and give something back.
Get involved in care and plantation of fruit trees.
Next, you will see the map. Data will be sent to servers on the Internet. You can view the Privacy Policy first, to make sure you know what happens then.
Would you like to open the Privacy Policy instead of the fruit map?
